Name: Statuette of Osiris
Description: Osiris is represented standing; his body is enveloped in a tightly fitting mummy gown leaving exposed only his hands holding a crook and a flail; he wears an elaborate atef-crown with ram's horns, uraeus and extra uraei on the horns, and a pleated artificial beard. The eyes had originally been inlaid. There is a tenon below the feet.
